What more can be said about this masterpiece? Believe it or not, I actually played this and all of the other Half Life 2 installments YEARS ago on my Xbox 360 version of The Orange Box. It was a gift from my uncle, unfortunately he has since passed. Although this happened a few months ago, I finally decided to splurge a little and buy the games for PC in his honor. After years of waiting and bad timing, I figured to just ignore the summer sales, I can get other Valve games then. I need those assets for GMOD!

Jesus, replaying this has been a trip. So many can do a perfect job of explaining what is so amazing about this game, and all of their personal experiences with it, so I will not, However, one thing I can say with absolute certainty is that I eagerly await the release of the next Half-Life installment, whether it be the final or not. After reading the Laidlaw script and watching playthroughs of Half-Life: Alyx (I cannot afford a VR headset), I am immeasurably excited for the outcome of the next game. Well dome, Valve, but try not to keep us waiting!! :)
